Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Sometimes teachers aren't able to give specific feedback or it's vague where as AI has your work right there and say explicitly whats wrong

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher made me feel like its obvious they weren't the one marking it whereas AI it is definitely more personalised
